What Our Customers Say Chicken Wings for John Jeffcoat ★★★★★ 
Great local spot. Staff & super friendly & they provide great service. Great place to watch a football game.
John Jeffcoat 
Restaurant and Bar for B W

★★★★★

Please bring back your amazing chicken salad!
B W 
Sports Restaurant for Seth Burnette

★★★★★

I just have to say that the value, price, and customer service at Kickin Chicken in Mt. Pleasant are amazing! I usually order food for my friends from different restaurants on Fridays. After a recent recommendation, I decided to try Kickin’ Chicken, and I'm so happy I did. We ordered wings, fries,
Read More Seth Burnette 
Restaurant Near Me for Trina H

★★★★★

It was a beautiful evening, so we sat outside. I had the pulled pork sandwich special with tots. The tots were cooked perfectly. We had some Bobbie fries for an appetizer and they were yummy. The chicken tenders were great too.
Trina H 
Sports Pub for Curtis Green

★★★★★

One of the best burgers I have ever had. The Bobby fries were excellent.
Curtis Green 
Local Sports Restaurant for Summer MCall

★★★★★

The food was really good and all came very fast. Our server was Maggie and she was phenomenal!!!
Summer MCall 
Local Pubs for Robert Bell

★★★★★

Visit weekly, Great wings. Cold Beer. Great Wraps.! Ariel, Shawna, Mckenzie, Johanna, Grant are all great bartenders!
Robert Bell 
Buffalo Wings for Justin Sharp

★★★★★

Loved the experience. It was my first time in Charleston area and my first time to the south. My first time for chicken and waffles and it was AMAZING! My boyfriend and I talk about it a lot. We will be going to eat here again when we come back to visit.

It’s been two years since we were there so
Read More Justin Sharp 
Chicken Wings for Bill Walters

★★★★★

Great service good food. Fast and friendly.
Bill Walters 
Restaurant and Bar for Isabell M

★★★★★

Very friendly staff welcomed us and was flexible with seating so that highchair can fit next to the table. The food (loaded fries, CBLT wraps, and salad) was delicious.
Isabell M

wings were a bit smallish, but that can flux.

★★★★★

Whenever in Charleston I always try and make it a point to come here. I highly recommend the Chicken and Waffles. The chicken is hand breaded and fried to perfection. The waffle was hot and crispy plus, they either use a sweet batter or put something in the batter to make it sweet. All in all for the

Chicken Wings for Lindsay Kale

★★★★★

We love this place- and added bonus that there is open air seating at a bar and outdoor table and chairs. But what would make this better is a location on Clements Ferry! There are plenty of open retail units and new builds so please come check it out!
Lindsay Kale

★★★★★

Stephanie Sorrentino

★★★★★

Mike Jefferson

Love this place!! Great atmosphere and a few games for kids. We enjoyed the food, service and drinks. A must visit
Pattie Kinowski
